entry.title: I need to find a better git workflow for posts. Currently posts published...
entry.content: I need to find a better git workflow for posts. Currently posts published through my micropub endpoint are pushed to a branch. That branch gets automatically deployed to preview on Netlify. On a push to main, a GitHub Action deploys to "production". I manually deploy changes when a post is made after I've previewed and "approved" them but doing a PR for all of these seems like overkill but that might be the way to go for now.

entry.title: This feels like a minor thing that I might not use often but I added a way to...
entry.content: This feels like a minor thing that I might not use often but I added a way to temporary delete posts by "marking" them deleted in my micropub endpoint. Eleventy then renders a "post deleted" page for that post

entry.title: I moved the short link functions to its own eleventy plugin and released it to...
entry.content: I moved the short link functions to its own eleventy plugin and released it to npm. It cleaned up a few things on my end but mostly I was hoping it would be beneficial to somebody else. eleventy-plugin-shortlinks
